I think you're pushing your luck with the joystick. Just use regular keyboard.

It would be in the tomb raider setup to configure a joystick.
You can use JoyToKey to make your joystick act as keyboard

Run it as 'Administrator' if you have savegame problems. It needs those privileges to write files to the drive.
